abstract: Richard Vollmer, a longtime season ticket holder, keeps the Islanders' 1993 playoff banner in his attic after winning it in a fan appreciation lottery.
snippet: Richard Vollmer, a longtime season ticket holder, keeps the Islanders' 1993 playoff banner in his attic after winning it in a fan appreciation lottery.
lead_paragraph: During the second intermission of an Islanders Fan Appreciation game back in 1994, Richard Vollmer was in his seat, keeping an eye on his children while flipping through the latest issue of The Hockey News. He heard the public address announcer at Nassau Coliseum say his seat's section, 336, as the Islanders were presenting prizes to thank fans for another season of support.

headline.main: Islanders' 1993 Division Playoff Banner Lives in a Fan's Attic
